segments.text: Good afternoon . Lotus Catering Company . Lilian speaking . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon . Lilian . This is Tom Baker over at Beck ’ s Trading company . We need to arrange a banquet for next Wednesday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , Mr . Baker . How many people are you planning to invite and how much would you like to spend per person ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . We ’ re expecting about twenty-five people and we ’ d like to spend no more than $ 20 a head .
segments.speaker: S2
